mapper.select: select t.title as productTitle, t.cover_url as productCover, t.store_id as storeId, r.line_id as productId from line_order r inner join `order` t on t.order_no = r.order_no where t.id = #{orderId} and r.order_no = #{orderNo} and t.deleted = false

select t.order_no as orderNo, r.cover_url as coverUrl, r.title, r.verify_no as verifyNo, t.duration, r.pay_type as payType, r.refund_type as refundType, r.refund_state as refundState, r.price, r.discount_amount as discountAmount, r.num, r.state, r.pay_amount as payAmount, r.create_time as createTime, r.pay_time as payTime, t.mobile, t.nick_name as nickName, r.complete_time as completeTime, t.visit_date as visitDate, t.duration, r.remark from `order` r inner join line_order t on t.order_no = r.order_no where t.deleted = false and r.member_id = #{memberId} and r.order_no = #{orderNo}

select t.order_no as orderNo, r.cover_url as coverUrl, r.title, r.verify_no as verifyNo, t.duration, r.pay_type as payType, r.refund_type as refundType, r.refund_state as refundState, r.price, r.discount_amount as discountAmount, r.num, r.state, r.pay_amount as payAmount, r.create_time as createTime, r.pay_time as payTime, t.mobile, t.nick_name as nickName, r.complete_time as completeTime, t.visit_date as visitDate, t.duration, r.remark from `order` r inner join line_order t on t.order_no = r.order_no where t.deleted = false and r.member_id = #{memberId} and r.order_no = #{orderNo}
